name: EnduranceRacingUpdates
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Two feeds are used in the briefing included current news on drivers and results featured in Worldwide Endurance Racing Championship (WEC) and DTM Sportscar Racing.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
